EmailTemplate.name: QSOL RENEWAL NOTICE CPG FLEET
EmailTemplate.subject: QSOL RENEWAL NOTICE CPG FLEET
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear
Our records show that your current subscription to Quickserve is due to expire on. If you would like to renew your subscription please send your Purchase Order back to 1300cummins@cummins.com
Please also check that the below contact information is correct & is up to date.
CPG
Quickserve Annual Subscription
$505.91+gst
CSP4022039
